titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the Air Force Assistant Surgeon General for Dental Services to serve in the grade of major general.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 6/19/2001--Introduced. Requires that the Air Force Assistant Surgeon General for Dental Services: (1) be appointed from Air Force officers serving above the grade of colonel (currently, lieutenant colonel); and (2) serve in the grade of major general (currently, brigadier general).
